bibl.title: The Resurrection of Aristeides, Miltiades, Solon and Perikles in Eupolis' Demes.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was presented at the annual meeting of the Australasian Society for Classical Studies (ASCS 27) hosted by the University of Tasmania in February 2006.
bibl.seg: Giulia Torello, The Resurrection of Aristeides, Miltiades, Solon and Perikles in Eupolis' Demes.
An earlier version of this paper was presented at the annual meeting of the Australasian Society for Classical Studies (ASCS 27) hosted by the University of Tasmania in February 2006.
